General.Name: Zhejiang Kaier New Materials
General.Description: Zhejiang Kaier New Materials Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of vitreous enamel panels in China and internationally. It offers wall cladding systems for metro stations, tunnels, external facade walls, underground walkways, and gas heaters. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Jinhua, China.
General.Address: Jinyi City Economic Development Zone, Jinhua, China, 321036

5.Name: Ms. Lei  Sheng
